title: Issue an Air Quality Alert
description: Environmental sensors report a spike in airborne pollutants. An operator must issue a public health alert.

tasks.description: Receive an alert that PM2.5 levels have exceeded the 'Unhealthy' threshold in the downtown area.
Draft a public health advisory message based on pre-approved templates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a clear message advising sensitive groups to remain indoors.

tasks.description: Broadcast the alert via the city's mobile app, social media channels, and digital billboards.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully disseminates the alert through multiple channels.
